header.headertext: AMENDMENTS TO BE MOVED IN COMMITTEE

text.quote: 000: After Clause 2, insert the following new Clause—
text.IndentOne: Before enactment, the Secretary of State shall lay before both Houses of Parliament a report which states—
(a) his assessment of the adequacy of the social security benefits listed in Schedule 1;
(b) the principles upon which the future up-rating of all benefits and tax credits covered by this Act will be based.”

text.quote: 000: Schedule 1, baroness Lister of Burtersett gives notice of her intention to oppose the Question that the Schedule be the Schedule to the Bill.
